Posts.Content: Dear Sheri T: I have read that apple cider vinegar is good, (not bad) for cancer patients. If you have info to the contrary, would you please send it to me. I am sending you a website that says the opposite: http:members.tripod.com/Howtuz/cidervinegar.html)Please read it and let me know what you think. If you have any problems in getting to this website, let me know and I will send it to you in another email.
Posts.Title: Maintaining Alkaline ph For Cancer Prevention
